messages.message: Hey, can I download results from the accuracy tests results page as an Excel or via API? I imagine this will be useful for teams collaborating and sharing results from development

currently no - this feature was de-prioritized from the original scope of solution accuracy

cc @hannah
We're tracking it here @Hamish, but not currently prioritized.
@Serena just curious though - is there anyway we could make our internal API external to support the ability to get accuracy metrics?
Or any estimate on the amount of work?

we already have an endpoint for fetching metrics (`GET /api/v2/ground-truth-sets/accuracy-tests/<accuracy-test-id>/metrics`), which returns all the metrics shown in the accuracy report page (without any ground truth value comparisons)

if this is sufficient, then yes we already support this!
awesome! Is this sufficient @Hamish? If so we could potentially document it to make available for external use
Though @Serena I think we need to expose the accuracy test id? Maybe more reason to have an identifier in the table
